# Content Switcher Extension for Quarto

This is a demonstration of the Content Switcher Extension for Quarto. This extension allows you to create content that changes based on user selection.

## Features

- Display different content based on user selection
- Works with both block-level and inline content
- Supports multiple versions of content
- Easy to use with simple markdown syntax

## Example

Check out the [Example](example.qmd) page to see the extension in action.

## Usage

### Block-level content

```markdown
::: {.content-switcher version="python"}
Python-specific content
:::

::: {.content-switcher version="r"}
R-specific content
:::
```

### Inline content

```markdown
You can use [pandas]{.content-switcher version="python"} [tidyverse]{.content-switcher version="r"} for data manipulation.
```

### Configuration

```yaml
content-switcher:
  default: "python"
  versions:
    - id: "python"
      label: "Python"
    - id: "r"
      label: "R"
  selector-position: "header"
```
